name: Weird Tiny Monster Mahjong Free - Addicting Chinese tile-matching board game
name_original: Weird Tiny Monster Mahjong Free - Addicting Chinese tile-matching board game
description:
This addicting Chinese tile-matching game has been around for hundreds of years but it's never been so easy to play, and with so many options, as it is here.

Simply tap two exposed tiles with matching tiny monsters (or from the same category, in the cases of the seasons and flowers) to remove them from the board and expose the tiles they were blocking. Try to clear the whole board in each of these fun Mahjong challenges.

Play Mahjong in a bamboo forest, the deep sea, or in fantasy realms. Or forget about settings entirely and focus instead on tile design itself with the monochromatic or doggy-themed games.

Perhaps the layout is more your thing. Tap away at stacks shaped like animals, tiny monsters, or abstract patterns. There are also special varieties of the game that include matches that must be made across different-colored tiles.

Even better: this classic board game will help you strengthen your analytical skills while you also improve your mental dexterity.

Features:

- Well-design levels

- Play with hints & rematch help

- Addicting play & time killer
